mapper.select: select c.no, c.room_no, c.send_mno, c.read_mno, m1.name as m1_name, m2.name as m2_name, m1.profile as m1_profile, m2.profile as m2_profile, to_char(time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') as time, to_char(time,'yyyy-MM-dd') as chatday, to_char(time,'HH24:mi') as chattime, c.content, r.mno1_lastvisit, r.mno2_lastvisit from chat c, members m1, members m2, room r where m1.no = c.send_mno and c.room_no = #{room_no} and m2.no = c.read_mno and r.room_no = c.room_no order by no

select r.room_no, r.mno1 as send_mno, r.mno2 as read_mno, m1.name as m1_name, m2.name as m2_name from room r, members m1, members m2 where room_no=#{room_no} and m1.no = r.mno1 and m2.no = r.mno2 and (m1.no=#{no} or m2.no=#{no})
mapper.insert: insert into chat(no,room_no,send_mno, read_mno, time,content) values(chat_seq.nextval, #{room_no},#{send_mno},#{read_mno},sysdate, #{content})
